title: Unable to buy anymore runes because I've reached a "max amount?"

replies.body:
Hey there,

Are you sure you don't currently own the maximum amount of that single rune you're able to?

It's also possible you've hit the max rune cap on your account (Which allows for a user to own ALL tier 3 runes and SOME extra runes (t2, etc), do you own any tier 2 runes?
